CustomField.description: This field is used to identify those who can work Treasury Requests in the Concierge queue (currently Dolores Leal and Robert Eagle). This field is used in a Validation Rule to restrict the editing of Treasury Requests after submission except for those who have this field checked.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field is used in a Validation Rule to restrict the editing of Treasury Requests after submission except for those who have this field checked.
CustomField.label: Treasury Request Queue Member
